PageTitle: display ip source check user-bind statistics
FuncDef: The display ip source check user-bind statistics command displays statistics about packets discarded by IP source guard. The display ip source check user-bind statistics command displays statistics about packets discarded by IP source guard. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ip source check user-bind statistics [ vlan [ <vlan-id> ] | interface [ <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays binding entries mapping a specified VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Displays binding entries mapping a specified interface:
interface-type.interface-number.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ip source check user-bind statistics
